storyInfo: Il Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare recommends himself for the role of Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici. The Penguin Logistics employees finally meet in Siracusa, but there are more pressing matters for them to resolve.

attributes.content: The most unremarkable Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare...
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And its popular but underappreciated segretario.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: At this point, men like Carracci, who were propped up to maintain balance between the major famiglie, are no longer needed.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: What you need is a puppet that is safe and useful.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Signor Segretario, a truly safe and useful puppet would never refer to himself as such.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I just happen to be a bit more self-aware than others.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Haha. And mightily self-aware you are.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You're right, Rubio. You are the best candidate to replace Carracci.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, if you're willing to be so frank with me, I might as well share something with you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: My associates killed Carracci.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You've got guts, and I like talking with men like you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So I'm willing to give you a chance.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Turn around and leave this room, forget what you just said, and no harm will come to you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Then, go back home and spend some time with your wife and daughter. Savor the last moments of peace in this city.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Doesn't that mean you'd need a puppet like me all the more?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You're after this chaos. What's happening all around us.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You want to overturn the law laid down by Signora Sicilia. But you don't care if she rules, or if we go back to the old ways.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The conflict among famiglie never had anything to do with us commoners.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: When something happens, we just wait to see the result.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: It makes no difference to the commoners whether Signora Sicilia rules, or you do.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But, the winner will need someone to maintain the facade of order.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: As the don of a famiglia, surely you understand this principle—
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: It isn't impossible for the commoners to survive without the famiglie, but the same cannot be said for the famiglie without the commoners.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You're telling me that you hold the real power?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: No. I'm making a self-serving justification for the weak.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: A good justification at that.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But it doesn't tell me what you're really after.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Power, Don Bernardo.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Since I was a kid, everyone's looked down on me, because I'm weak. And I look like, you know, this.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The oppression I felt from the people around me was more real than anything the famiglie ever did.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I've suffered that my entire life, waiting for this chance.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You tell me you're one who had Carracci killed? All I can think is: thank goodness I came at the right time.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You may not want to hear this, but if you're going up against Signora Sicilia, it's probably not going to go your way.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But who cares? Doesn't matter to me if you win or lose, in the end—
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But power is something Signora Sicilia can't give me. It's gotta be you.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You're an honest man, Rubio. I like making friends with honest men.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Don Bernardo... (*whispers*)
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: Give my order. Tell them, that's enough for today.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: What just happened?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That room over there... started shaking?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Looks like she chose you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That earthquake is Giovanna's Arts.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Sounds like they had a falling out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Look, Texas jumped out the window. Let's go after her!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ahh, Texas. If, and I mean if, we were friends back then... could I have kept you in Siracusa?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hah, fat chance, right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We would've just slaughtered each other.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lavinia, don't make me... kill you.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I've got a job to do.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia, I pray that you aren't born in Siracusa the next time around.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Just a second.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: You're one of Saluzzo's hitmen, right? This operation... is over.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Don Bernardo's orders, just in.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Lavinia, you shouldn't have shown your face here.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: That's not up to you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've interfered with a Saluzzo operation. That's going to ruin the relationship between our two famiglie.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So, why don't you go beg Alberto's forgiveness with my head on a silver platter?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Wait, please. Signor Bernardo... I mean, Don...
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I have a presumptuous request.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I imagine Signor Leontuzzo will be very busy in the future. It'll unrealistic to expect him to help me the way he did Carracci.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I'd like to ask you for a new assistant.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The judge here would be a suitable pick.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: That certainly is one option.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What are you two talking about?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Ah, how impertinent of me, carrying on this conversation without including the subject, Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Don Bernardo has decided that I, Rubio, the humble ex-Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare, shall take Carracci's place as the next Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And I have to admit, I'm not too experienced with bureaucratic affairs.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: So I hope that you, as someone with ample experience, will become my assistant.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: (I wonder how Sora and the others are doing...)
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What? Why... are you here?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: When you get old, you start looking for a place to enjoy the rest of your days.
Found her! She's right over there!
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Surround her!
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Looks like you insist on getting in my way.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She's still worried about you, after what happened.
As for me, I'm old now, so I spend my days taking care of the youth. It's a hobby.
Stay a while and have a chat with your elder.
Next time.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Croissant?!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ohoh, let's have a look-see, who's off fighting all by herself?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Why are you all here?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: As far as I can tell, the Siracusan families always fight together. It's your culture.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And Penguin Logistics's culture iiiis—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: To party hard?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: In this case, it should be—
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Don't be afraid to rumble, right?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Seriously though, old man. You think you could let this one slide, a favor from one Sankta to another?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Get'cher head on straight, Exusiai.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You do have a point.
Ahh, the rainy season in Siracusa is a long one. It didn't bother me when I was young, but now, the arthritis is such a hassle.
Children, striving for strength is fine, but remember to put your health and safety first.
Eh, yer pullin' my leg.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Thanks a bunch!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: By the way, if I ever did want to talk with you, how could I find you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If you're searching for redemption, I'm afraid there's nothing I can do for you.
But if you're searching for order, you will find me everywhere.
That's enough. Let's get out of here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Woohoo!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Donna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The Bellones have retreated.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Where's Cellinia?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Gone.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Gone?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: She couldn't kill me, and I couldn't kill her.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Let's head back and prepare. The Bellones aren't going to let this go.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You've won, Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Your original plan wasn't to win over Wallach, was it?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But wasn't that the best option, given the circumstances?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Can't deny that. *cough* *cough*
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Alright, enough talk. Let's get you in the car.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon, you still haven't given up, have you?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Compared to what Lavinia has been through, this setback is nothing.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're going to do great things.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Maybe one day, you might actually be able to realize your dreams in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And when that time comes, you'll be my right-hand man.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't get along with Lavinia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: There are some things better left to her, and others better left for you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Haha, you cheeky bastard. You're already thinking about that kind of stuff?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri... I'm still angry about what you and my father were plotting.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't understand why he insists on continuing, even now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, in the end, I'm still a part of this famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Safe landing!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: *gasp*... *gasp*... It feels great to be back on our own turf.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Phew... Siracusans sure are a pain in the ass. I'm totally wiped.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You hanging in there, Sora?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yes. But my dress got a little torn up.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Well, shoot. That one was awfully expensive, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ahaha, we'll figure something out.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Alrighty, one bottle per person.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: C'mon, knock it off with that stone face.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Just think of it this way: the three of us also happened to be on vacation here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Then... what's with the show?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh... That's, umm... just a way to grow my career~
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Plus, I thought it might make finding you a little easier.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I reckon it sure did, lookin' at the way things turned out.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sure enough.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The atmosphere remains chilly for a while.
But finally, an unavoidable problem emerges.
Where do they go from here?
Texas does not have it in her to ask.
Tex...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Texas, I had an agreement with the director.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Now that I've found you, I will stay here and complete my performance contract.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've spoken with the director a few times. It's a little scary, in retrospect, but I don't think he's the kind of man to hold our lives over you.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You have a point. If he wanted to do something like that, he would've locked us up a long time ago.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Okay, alright, let's quit the jawin'. You keep talkin' and I keep gettin' scareder n' scareder.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We really are here to see you. If it wasn't so dangerous out there, I'd like you to show us around.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Okay... When we're through all this, I'll give you a tour.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Anyways, let's celebrate this Penguin Logistics reunion in Siracusa!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Cheers!
attributes.name: All Four

attributes.content: The biggest thing—
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: An unknown number...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I don't remember ever giving out this number...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hello? Who am I speaking with...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It seems you're safe and sound, Signorina Sora. That's a relief.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You know what happened with Texas, right?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Don't worry, Signorina.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Your Penguin Logistics friends must be enjoying a joyous reunion.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And I certainly don't want to interrupt that.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But I was just thinking you might have a lot of questions for me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So, I'll be waiting for you at the theater tomorrow.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Sora
